I'm a Ph.D. in linguistics from UC San Diego. I am currently a post-doctoral fellow in the Department of Psychiatry at UC San Diego under the supervision of [Professor Chuchu Li](https://profiles.ucsd.edu/chuchu.li). My research interests are in language documentation and voice quality.
